name: ValueSetYesNoNotApplicableVitalRecords
title: ValueSet - Yes No Not Applicable Vital Records
description:
A set of codes used to respond to any question that can be answered Yes, No, or Not Applicable. Based on [Yes No Not Applicable (NCHS)[2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7486]](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7486)

Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ConceptMapYesNoNotApplicableVitalRecords.html).
